document_data.name: Hojo Kamuri
document_data.mainbody: '''Hojo Kamuri''' was a former [[shogun]] of [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Kamuri ruled as shogun until retired in favor of his son and become a monk at [[Namikami Temple]] under the name of '''Bentori'''. However his grandson [[Hojo Todahiro]] lost the [[Hojo war]] in [[1349 DR]]. In [[1355 DR]] Kamuri become a leader inside the temple because the patriarch [[Futoro]] injured and soon he took the role of planner of drill of the local [[Sohei]] armies. Soon they pledged loyalty to him. He supported his great-grandson [[Hojo Kawakubo]] in his plots to undermine [[Takenaka Okawa]].
document_data.Personality: Kamuri was an able samurai known for his archery skills. However he looked like an ordinary monk to those unfamiliar with him.
